title: Engineers Made a DIY Face Shield  Now  It s Helping Doctors
description: After a hospital put out a call for protective gear  three friends developed a product in a few days  Their design is now being manufactured by Ford
content: Early last week  Lennon Rodgers  director of the Engineering Design Innovation Lab at University of Wisconsin Madison  got an urgent email from the universitys hospital  Could his lab make     face shields to protect staff testing and treating Covid   pati    chars
